  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataField, IValidateButtons, ICreateDeckPanel, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class CreateDeckPanel
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
implements IDataField, IValidateButtons, ICreateDeckPanel
    The panel for the deck creation process Used to allow the user to create a new deck by filling out the indicated fields

        public boolean validateField(IErrorView warningField,
                    boolean showLabel,
                    boolean showBox)
        Checks all fields to determine if they are prepared to be removed. If a field is invalid then it warns the user with a notification and by highlighting the offending box on the GUI.
        Specified by:
        validateField in interface IDataField
        Parameters:
        warningField - the field to output the errors to
        showLabel - to show a label if the text is invalid
        showBox - to show a box around this field if the field is invalid
        Returns:
        true If all fields are valid and the window is ready to be removed
